Literature.Title: Enhancement of Antibacterial Activity of Short Tryptophan-rich Antimicrobial Peptide Pac-525 by Replacing Trp with His(chx)
Literature.Author: Ahn M, Rajasekaran G, Gunasekaran P, Ryu EK, Lee GH, Hyun JK, Cheong C, Kim NH, Shin SY, Bang JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3089(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3090(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3095(MIC=8µg/ml)
